Rules.title: Game Rules
Rules.intro: Welcome to CARTEADO! Here are the rules:
Rules.rule1Text: The game starts with you choosing from 6 cards. You pick 3 cards to be used at the end of the game, placed face down, and 3 cards that go directly into your hand.
Rules.rule2Text: Whenever it's your turn, you must play a card equal to or greater than the card on the table.
Rules.specialCards2: Card 2: Skips the next player's turn.
Rules.specialCards10: Card 10: Clears all cards on the table.
Rules.rule4Text: When you have 4 cards with the same number or letter, you can clear the table. Additionally, you can play the last card that completes the sequence of 4 cards, even outside your turn.
Rules.rule5Text: You never draw cards directly, but you must always keep at least 3 cards in hand while there are cards available to draw.
Rules.rule6Text: When there are no more cards to draw, you must flip up the face-down cards you still have. When these cards run out, you randomly choose one of the face-down cards to play.

errors.ROOM_IS_PLAYING: The room is already in game
errors.OWNER_SHOULD_BEGIN: Only the room owner can start the game
errors.HAVE_NOT_PLAYED: You haven't played a card yet
errors.LOWER_RANK: You must play a higher rank card
errors.DIFFERENT_CARD: You must play a card equal to or special like the previous one
